Project Summary

Project Information

Field Value
Name Cyc Java API
Description Java APIs to support development of Cyc-based applications and, more generally, interacting with the Cyc system.
Homepage http://dev.cyc.com/api/

Project Organization

Field Value
Name Cycorp, Inc
URL http://www.cyc.com

Build Information

Field Value
GroupId com.cyc
ArtifactId cyc-api
Version 1.0.0-rc4
Type jar
JDK Rev 1.6
